name: osu-preview
description: Browser extension for previewing osu beatmaps.

scripts.build: rm -rf build/ && cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --config webpack.production.config.js
scripts.build:chrome: cross-env BUILD_CHROME=1 npm run build && (cd build; zip -qr ../osu-preview-chrome.zip *) && rm -rf build/
scripts.build:firefox: cross-env BUILD_FF=1 npm run build && (cd build; zip -qr ../osu-preview-firefox.zip *) && rm -rf build/
scripts.build:all: rm -f osu-preview-chrome.zip osu-preview-firefox.zip && npm run build:chrome && npm run build:firefox

author: Jerry Zhu
